metadata.title: CVE-2024-26751 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ARM:ep93xx: Add terminator to gpiod_lookup_table Without the terminator, if acon_id is passed to gpio_find() that does not exist in the lookup table thefunction will not stop looping correctly, and eventually cause an oops.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
